statements: UPDATE blocks SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE block_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE blocks SET transactions = '{"txn_id": "txn123", "amount": 100}' WHERE block_id = '567e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE blocks SET transactions = '{"tx1": "100 ETH", "tx2": "50 BTC"}', timestamp = '2022-09-15 12:30:00' WHERE block_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

UPDATE block_transactions SET sender_address = '0x123abc', receiver_address = '0x456def' WHERE block_id = 100
UPDATE transaction_details SET transaction_type = 'Transfer', public_key = 'pubkey123', signature = 'sign123' WHERE transaction_id = 500
UPDATE block_transactions SET sender_address = '0x123abc', receiver_address = '0x456def' WHERE block_id = 100 AND transaction_id = 500

UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE transaction_id = 1;

UPDATE block_transactions SET transaction_id=1001 WHERE tx_id=50;
